Summary: triangular ufo crossing near fort lauderdale airport from north to south west of i-95
divs: Sighting DetailsAt around 10.15 pm. on September 19 2008. My neberwood sitting on a chair outside looking at the sky say a strange objet passing over him from north to south just about 1,500 feets west of the fort lauderdale airport west of i-95 crossing the landing and take off way. it was an triangular shape objet with white lights under and any noise was eard come from this thing from north going south heading for miami we never saw any plane north-south alway est-west or west est. i include a draw of it. at 1.30 am i called tv chanel 7 news to see if somebody have report something similar but they said no. I did loose my time to call airport cause they will denied any thing anyway.
